author: stationarycopper
title: It does what it is supposed to.
review: You put inline between the battery box and the motor it switches polarity and has an off position. It does exactly what it is supposed to do easily . If it could be smaller that would be nice.

author: Lego123_
title: Quite good
review: This product is quite good. Its easy to use; it can change the polarity and there is stop position. I didnt give it very good rating because I dont nearly never use it because u can use the remote controls so its nearly useless. If u buy it u wont need many. I would like if there was also a speed dial like in rechargeable battery box in this swithc. Then it would be more usefull
